EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: MIMED Batch Edit Provider Data Form
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: MIMED Batch Edit Provider Data Form
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: UM Dev

SaveImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDIT_UMHSBATCH_PROVIDERS ( @ID uniqueidentifier ,@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier ,@SEQUENCE int -- Batch fields ,@PROVIDERID uniqueidentifier -- Primary Record ID ,@CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ,@PROVIDERDRNUMBER nvarchar(50) ,@UMEMPLID nvarchar(200) ,@UMUNIQUENAME nvarchar(200) ,@LASTNAME nvarchar(200) ,@FIRSTNAME nvarchar(100) ,@PHONE nvarchar(100) ,@ADMITDOCTORIND bit ,@ATTENDDOCTORIND bit ,@RESIDENTDOCTORIND bit ,@CONSULTDOCTORIND bit ,@DEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier ,@SUBDEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier ,@UMHSDATA_LASTPROCDATE datetime ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try
-- handle updating the data update dbo.USR_UMHS_BATCH_PROVIDERS set SEQUENCE = @SEQUENCE ,PROVIDERID = @PROVIDERID ,CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID ,PROVIDERDRNUMBER = @PROVIDERDRNUMBER ,UMEMPLID = @UMEMPLID ,UMUNIQUENAME = @UMUNIQUENAME ,LASTNAME = @LASTNAME ,FIRSTNAME = @FIRSTNAME ,PHONE = @PHONE ,ADMITDOCTORIND = @ADMITDOCTORIND ,ATTENDDOCTORIND = @ATTENDDOCTORIND ,RESIDENTDOCTORIND = @RESIDENTDOCTORIND ,CONSULTDOCTORIND = @CONSULTDOCTORIND ,DEPARTMENTID = @DEPARTMENTID ,SUBDEPARTMENTID = @SUBDEPARTMENTID ,UMHSDATA_LASTPROCDATE = @UMHSDATA_LASTPROCDATE ,CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID ,DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE where ID = @ID end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;

FormField.Description: UMHSDATA Import of the Process Date.
FormField.Caption: UMHSDATA Import process date
